alert.note: Alert for McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:59PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN MCKENZIE COUNTY THROUGH 1030 PM MDT... At 959 PM MDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Skaar, or 22 miles south of Sidney, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern McKenzie County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
